summary:
Worn and Weathered Warpaints, in High Definition and Lore Friendly.
These may replace the default Male warpaints, or overwrite male warpaints previously installed.
Due to populare demand, I've now added a 'For Her' version!
More to come!
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i1340.photobucket.com/albums/o723/Diethardt/2013-02-09_00023_zps11130032.jpg[/IMG][/center]
[center][font=Nueva Std][color=#E42217][size=5][b]These are Custom Unique Warpaints created by Me.
(DIETHARDT)[/b][/size][/color][/center][/font]
[center][youtube]toN4CzY5TEw[/youtube][/center]

[center][IMG]http://i1340.photobucket.com/albums/o723/Diethardt/Updates_zps67f356de.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[center][color=#E42217][size=5][b][i]v2.0 is Here![/i][/b][/size][/color][/center]
[center][color=#E42217][size=5][b][i]*New v1.2* Thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2950481]expired6978[/url]'s awesome work, I now have a version for his awesome [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29624/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D29624]RaceMenu[/url]! This makes it now pretty much Stand Alone, as it will work in conjuction with outher warpaints! RaceMenu is needed though.[/i][/b][/size][/color][/center]
[center][color=#E42217][size=5][b][i]*New v1.1* Due to popular demand, I've now added
~ Weathered and Worn Warpaints 'For Her'! ~[/i][/b][/size][/color][/center]
[center][color=#E42217][size=5][b][i]*New v1.1* Have Now fixed the Low Res version to an Actual Low Res version, my apologies. [/i][/b][/size][/color][/center]
[center][color=#E42217][size=3][b][i]*New v1.1*I have also released a modders resource file, containing both male and female versions.[/i][/b][/size][/color][/center]

[center][IMG]http://i1340.photobucket.com/albums/o723/Diethardt/Install_zps360bd848.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[center]Simply open the .rar file, drag and drop the Data file into your Skyrim folder and overwrite if needed. You can also copy and paste the single file you wish to use in the Tintmasks folder. (Data/texture/actors/character/character assets/tintmasks).[/center]

[center]If you don't want to replace the specific warpaint number I have saved, chose the number you want to replace and after the underscore (_) change the number to the one you want to use (01-10).[/center]

[center][IMG]http://i1340.photobucket.com/albums/o723/Diethardt/Uninstall_zpsf19307e8.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[center]Delete the files in the Tintmasks folder to return to the vanilla warpaint or overwrite with your own or other warpaints if you so choose.[/center]

[center][IMG]http://i1340.photobucket.com/albums/o723/Diethardt/Recommended_zps37f162ac.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29624/][b]RACE MENU[/b][/url] by [b]Expired[/b] will help tremendously with utilizing the high deffinition of these warpaints. It is not necessary, but it is HIGHLY RECOMMENDED! They will NOT look like they do in my screenshots otherwise.[/center]

[center][size=5][color=#E42217][font=Nueva Std][i][u][b]FOR THE WARPAINTS TO LOOK LIKE THEY DO IN MY IMAGES[/b][/u][/i]:[/font][/size][/color][/center]

[center]You should use [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/download/skse_1_06_13.7z]SKSE 1.6.13[/url]. Thanks to an INI setting added to SKSE, it is now possible to use HD (2048x2048) warpaint applied to your character rather than being limited to the vanilla resolution (256x256). To allow this you MUST have SKSE installed and you should add these lines to your SKSE.INI:[/center]

[color=#000000][b][Display]
iTintTextureResolution=2048[/b][/color]

[center][u]Note[/u]: Prior to the introduction of this SKSE settings, no matter how big the textures were, the game downscaled them to the vanilla resolution at 256 x 256. This setting though, while allowing for higher resolution warpaints, will cause low resolution textures to look worse due to upscaling.[/center]

[center]Because these are done in Hi Def 2048 x 2048, if you do not use this SKSE tweak, the warpaints will look more pixelated than in my images.[/center]

[center][IMG]http://i1340.photobucket.com/albums/o723/Diethardt/Permissions_zps231a7f3d.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[center]The assets from this file may not be used without my expressed permission. Please feel free to ask, as I will usually approve. Thank you for your respect regarding this.[/center]

[center][IMG]http://i1340.photobucket.com/albums/o723/Diethardt/Acknowledgements_zps47630948.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[center][color=#E42217][b]THANKS[/b][/color] to Every One of my friends, for sharing all of the Awesome and Inspirational screenarchery that you all do so well! There are far too many of you for me to name you all! ;)[/center]

[center][color=#E42217][b]HUGE THANKS[/b][/color] to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2950481]expired6978[/url] for his work on the RaceMenu version![/center]

[center][color=#E42217][b]SPECIAL THANKS[/b][/color] to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1924379]TairenSoul[/url] for all the time you spent showing me the light! You're the best! None of this would have been possible without you![/center]

[center][i]If you like this,[/i]
Check out my other mod!
My Warpaints work great with,
[b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31665/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D31665]Better Makeup for SKSE[/url] by ME[/b][/center]

[center][i][b]Other tattoo/warpaint mods that are Awesome!
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25791/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D25791]TairenSoul Tattoo Warpaint for Men[/url] by TairenSoul
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25211/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D25211]TairenSoul Face Tattoo Warpaint (women)[/url] by TairenSoul
There are also many others to search for as well! so ~Let's get our Faces On![/b][/i][/center]
author: Diethardt
